named-query.name: findBpmConfUser
named-query.query: select _bpmConfUser from BpmConfUser _bpmConfUser where _bpmConfUser.procDefId = ? and _bpmConfUser.procDefKey = ? and _bpmConfUser.taskDefKey = ?

named-query.name: findNotAssignRoleByUserTask
named-query.query: select _role from Role _role where _role.id not in( select _role.id from BpmConfUser _bpmConfUser inner join _bpmConfUser.roles _role where _bpmConfUser.procDefId = ? and _bpmConfUser.procDefKey = ? and _bpmConfUser.taskDefKey = ?)
